oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discussion and performance - Bob Boilen and John Paul White - 2016-09-23
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: National Public Radio Music's host Bob Boilen discusses his book Your Song Changed My Life from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on September 23, 2016. John Paul White joins the discussion and performs. Presented in partnership with the Americana Music Association.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bob Boilen; John Paul White;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Includes comments from AMA Director of Conference Programming & Education Danna Strong. Includes selected recorded audio excerpts. John Paul White talks about his background and the song that changed his life, John Prine's Sam Stone. Performance includes: Black Leaf -- I Remember You (accapella) -- Everything That Glitters Is Not Gold -- Sam Stone.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Boilen, Bob; White, John Paul; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
